third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon has chances but Levan is the favorite. It may be close but still bets on Levan.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Very strong, especially in wrist and pronation
Levan Saginashvili.health: Had some issues with wrist curl recently
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Dominant in previous matches, but recent training shows slightly lower wrist strength

Devon Larratt.strength: Strong, especially in psychological pressure and versatility
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Has been improving and adapting, but lost 6-0 to Levan last time

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Kamil is slightly favored due to better side pressure and experience, but Tobias has adapted well with his new style.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Tobias has strong grip and hand, which could trouble Kamil if he controls the pronator.

Kamil Jablonski.strength: Strong in defensive positions and side pressure
Kamil Jablonski.previous_match_summary: Experienced and consistent in left arm matches

Tobias Sporrong.strength: Strong grip and hand, adapted to use side pressure more
Tobias Sporrong.previous_match_summary: Showed good adaptation against Wagner, but less experienced in left arm
